detail_desc: Slim-fit trousers in stretch twill. High waist with adjustable elastication (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button, back pockets and narrow hems.
V-neck top in airy linen jersey with long sleeves and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Hat in a soft, sturdy rib knit with faux fur pompoms on top.
Cold shoulder top in soft cotton jersey with a frill trim and long sleeves.
Dress with a soft jersey bodice, visible zip at the back and short cap sleeves. Seam at the waist and a lined, flared skirt in a patterned weave with a sheen.
Hat in soft rib-knit cashmere.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, embroidered motif on the front and kangaroo pocket. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit trainer socks with a ribbed section over the foot and slightly higher shaft at the heel for optimum fit. Reinforced heel and toe for perfect, friction-free comfort.

Jacket in a cotton twill weave with a collar and concealed fasteners down the front, flap chest pockets and side pockets. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a seam with a drawstring at the waist. Unlined.
T-shirt in printed cotton jersey.
Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured-knit organic cotton with front pockets and straps that cross and fasten at the back.
Fully lined, patterned bikini. Top with narrow, crossover shoulder straps and a plastic fastener at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with contrasting colour stripes down the sides, a regular, elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Block-coloured T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs.
Hair scrunchies in elasticated fabric.
Shorts in jacquard-weave cotton with adjustable tabs at the sides and a zip fly with a concealed hook and eye fastening. Side pockets, welt back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Swim shorts in a printed weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Soft mesh inner shorts.
T-shirt in soft jersey with a round neckline with a narrow, ribbed trim.
Trousers in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a high, elasticated waist with pleats, side pockets, fake back pockets and tapered legs with creases.
Jumper in a fine knit with a supersoft, brushed finish. V-neck with a wide lace trim, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
T-shirt in soft cotton with a glittery print on the front, vertical seam at the back and gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy.
Short skirt in a soft weave with pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and a sewn-in tie belt. Unlined.
Short, fitted dress in soft jersey with short sleeves.
Jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short fancy dress top in jersey with shell-shaped, padded cups with a silicone trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and an elasticated hem.
Ballet pumps in imitation suede with a bow at the front and grosgrain trim around the edge. Satin linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Hat in soft thermal fleece.
Shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Fitted top in stretch jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Short, straight-style T-shirt in soft jersey with ribbing around the neckline and an embroidered motif at the top. The cotton content of the T-shirt is organic.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey with long sleeves and a gathered seam at one side for a gentle draped effect. Slits in the sides.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Scarf in a soft alpaca-blend weave with a lightly brushed finish. Fringe trims along the short sides.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Top in a soft rib knit with a flounce around the neckline, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and mesh hem.
Self-tie bow tie in silk. Adjustable length. Total length 80 cm, width at the widest point 6 cm.
Ankle boots in imitation suede with a zip on one side. Fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Sandals in matt imitation leather with adjustable straps over the foot with metal buckles and a heel strap with a hook and loop fastening. Moulded imitation leather insoles and fluted soles.
Loafers in suede with pointed toes and tassels at the front. Leather linings and insoles. Heel 0.5 cm.
Long-sleeved shirt in a soft, patterned viscose weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Slightly longer with a rounded hem at the back.
Ankle-length trousers in an airy viscose weave. High waist with covered elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and tapered legs.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front.
Shorts in an airy cotton weave with an elasticated, drawstring waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets with a press-stud.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, front and back pockets, and narrow hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Short dress in jersey with a V-neck and elastic spaghetti shoulder straps that cross at the back. Double layer at the top.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a print motif.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned viscose weave with a high waist, zip in the side, side pockets and straight legs with flounced hems.
Short top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a lined, drawstring hood and long, wide sleeves.
Flared, calf-length satin dress with a V-neck and a small stand-up collar with long ties at the front. Short, wide raglan sleeves and wide tiers to the hem. Lined.

5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs. The jeans are made from selvedge denim, a high-quality denim woven on traditional shuttle looms with a distinctive red and white selvedge that stops the fabric from unravelling.

Two-button jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, a fake pocket at the top, flap front pockets, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. The polyester content of the jacket is recycled.
Loose-fit pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Slippers in a soft, textured knit with faux fur linings and insoles and soft soles.
Flared skirt in a double layer of tulle with lots of volume. Elasticated waist. Lined.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a wide elasticated flounce at the top.
Metal stud earrings in the shape of a knot. Size 1.5 cm.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in an airy viscose weave with broderie anglaise. Smocking at the top,long sleeves and elasticated cuffs with a flounce.
Fitted, smocked top in tulle with a small, raw-edge frill trim at the top, wide shoulder straps with a bow on each shoulder and a raw-edge flounce at the hem.
Long-sleeved dress and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Tailored trousers in a slightly stretchy weave with a low waist, zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and a security button on the inside of the waistband. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and flared hems with a slit at the front. Part of the polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
T-shirt in ribbed jersey with contrasting colour ribbing around the neckline and sleeves.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Washed cotton twill trousers in a regular fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Long-sleeved all-in-one pyjamas in soft, printed organic cotton jersey with press-stud fastenings.
Shorts in stretch, denim-look jersey made from a cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Fine-knit polo shirt in a silk and cotton blend with a button placket and ribbing at the collar, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved dress in sturdy jersey made from a cotton blend with a visible zip at the back, front pockets and a detachable braided belt in imitation suede. Unlined.
Shirt in an airy weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Chest pocket, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, and a rounded hem.

Calf-length dress in an airy Tencel™ lyocell weave with a wrapover top and sewn-on band at the waist that ties at the back. Decorative gathers on the shoulder seams and at the back of the neckline. Short, wide sleeves, and two slits at the front. Unlined.

Set with a cardigan and pair of trousers in soft, organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Cardigan with press-studs down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Trousers with elastication at the waist and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in organic cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
